subject: GREETINGS
body:
Attention: Gale,

Thanks for your email message and also for your understanding, We have not
received your delivery details as requested, So kindly forward to us your
full information to enable us to proceed with the delivery properly.
Without wasting much of your time, the delivery fee is only $200 USD and
you are advised to send the fee via Western Union or Money gram office
outlet with the below information;

Receivers Name :::::: DAVID  EKECHUKWU
Country :::::::: Benin Republic
City ::::::::: Cotonou
Receivers Address : Address:- Boulevard De France 08 Bp 0897
Amount: $200 USD.

Please make the payment immediately and confirm the payment details so that
we can start the ATM delivery process and to enable us actualise the
delivery process immediately.

Looking forward for your urgent response

Thank you,
Mrs. Stephanie Smith.
